snippet: Giant crocodiles, far larger than any known to date, lived in Kenya two million to four million years ago among our human ancestors, according to a new report.
abstract: Dr Christopher A Brochu study in The Journal of Vertebrate Paleontology identifies giant prehistoric crocodile that lived in Kenya over two million years ago, among human ancestors; ancient species is not closely related to the modern Nile crocodile.
lead_paragraph: Giant crocodiles, far larger than any known to date, lived in Kenya two million to four million years ago among our human ancestors, according to a new report.

headline.print_headline: A Crocodile Too Huge To Fit on the Family Tree
headline.seo: A Crocodile Too Huge to Fit on the Family Tree
headline.main: A Crocodile Too Huge to Fit on the Family Tree
